title: Tool Registration and Management
description: As a tool owner, I want to add, edit, and remove my tools from the library so that I can share them with my neighbors
acceptanceCriteria: AC01: Given a logged-in user, when they access the 'Add Tool' page, they should see a form requesting tool title and description
AC02: Given a tool title, when a tool is being created, then an appropriate image should be automatically fetched and associated
AC03: Given a tool submission, when all required fields are filled, then the tool should be created and saved
AC04: Given a tool owner, when they view their tools, they should see a list of all their registered tools
AC05: Given a tool owner viewing their tool, when they click edit, they should be able to modify the tool's title and description
AC06: Given a tool owner viewing their tool, when they click delete, they should be asked to confirm before the tool is removed
AC07: Given a failed image search, when adding a tool, then a default tool image should be used
